mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, board_id, user_id, parent_id, content, created_at, updated_at, deleted FROM comments WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND deleted = 'N' ORDER BY created_at DESCs
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET content = #{content}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE comments SET updated_at = SYSDATE, deleted = 'Y' WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (comment_id, board_type, board_id, user_id, parent_id, content, created_at, deleted) VALUES ( #{commentId}, #{boardType}, #{boardId}, #{userId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N' )
